raw_text:
# Planning Division Handouts and Forms

Frequently used Planning Division handouts and forms can be found below.

For all other permit applications, general inquiries, and related matters, please visit our [EZ Permit Hub](https://elsegundoca.portal.opengov.com/categories/1078) to submit any inquiries. The new system provides a user-friendly interface to streamline the process and improve staff ability to respond in a timely manner and track the status of your inquiry.

If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to our dedicated support team at 310-524-2380. They will be happy to help you navigate the new system or address any concerns you may have.

## Handouts and Forms

- Urban Lot Splits & Two-unit Development in the R1 Zone
- Environmental Information Form
- Construction Questionnaire
- Landscaping Regulations
- Landscape Compliance Certificate
- Water Calculations Sample
- Sample Mailing List
- SB 330 Residential and Protected Unit Determination Forms

Free viewers are required for some of the attached documents.
They can be downloaded by clicking on the icons below.

structured_data.overview: Information about Planning Division handouts and forms, including a new EZ Permit Hub system for permit applications and inquiries.
